title: Foundational Mathematics Curriculum Through Active Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts at the Secondary School Level
context.additional_context: Interactive learning environment utilizing VR simulations and digital devices, focusing on real-life problem-solving reflecting social contexts

learning_goals: Learners improve their function graph interpretation skills by over 80% while collaboratively solving math problems in a VR simulation environment.
Learners apply creative problem-solving strategies more than three times while resolving equation modeling tasks using digital collaboration tools with team members.
Based on formative assessment data, learners diagnose individual learning weaknesses and set improvement goals exceeding 90% via a VR feedback system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
